snippet.title: Cube de Grace | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Cube de Grace is CDG. It’s like CCG but with dice instead of cards to bring more fun and randomness to the game. The random aspect can still be managed with the help of skills, items, and other mechanics.
Win battles and explore the galaxy to upgrade your collection. Add heroes and items to the mix and find your own way to control your fate. 

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2341200/Cube_de_Grace/ 
Official site: https://cubedegrace.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/g7fErbzuNj 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CDGgame
